Rogers.Walmart Arkansas Music Pavilion:
The Walmart Arkansas Music Pavilion (AMP) is a 7,000 seat outdoor music venue located in Rogers, Arkansas, opposite the Pinnacle Hills Promenade shopping center. It was established at this location in 2014.


== History ==
The Walmart AMP has been a Walton Arts Center venue since the purchase from previous owners Suzie Stephens and Brian Crowne prior to 2011.
